yacl3.config.stfu:config.title: STFU
The maximum number of messages to keep in chat history.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.announceAdvance: If minecraft shows advancements achieved in chat.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.advancementToas: If minecraft shows advancements achieved as a toast.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.recipeToasts.de: If minecraft shows a toast when you unlock new recipes.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.adminChat.desc: Whether you receive a message when an admin or command block runs a command.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.compactChat.des: When you receive multiple equal chat messages, compact them into one.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.disableWidgetFa: Disable the 2 seconds all buttons are invisible on the title screen after loading.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.disableFade.des: Disable the 2 second fade animation when the game or resources (re)load.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.disableLoadingT: Hide the loading terrain screen to speed up world loading. This creates a small flicker and lag spike when loading.
yacl3.config.stfu:config.fixModelGaps.de:
Changes the item model generation code to prevent gaps.
This may or may not cause problems on macos.
Requires a reload to take effect.
